name: Tool Offered - Checklist & Follow-up Date Reminder
description: When Ana moves a lead to 'Tool Offered', this scenario: (1) Populates Current Tasks with a checklist reminding her to send voice memo and set follow-up date, (2) Waits 10 minutes then checks if Next Action Date is set, (3) Pings Ana if she forgot.

scenario_2.name: Tool Offered - Follow-up Date Check
actions: Check if Next Action Date is empty
If empty, notify Ana via Slack/email

setup_instructions.step_1: Create TWO scenarios in Make.com from this blueprint
setup_instructions.step_3: Scenario 2: 'Tool Offered - Date Check' using flow_scenario_2
setup_instructions.step_6: Configure Slack connection and set channel/DM for Ana (or use email alternative)
setup_instructions.step_8: Test: Move a lead to 'Tool Offered', verify checklist appears, wait 10 min without setting date, verify ping
setup_instructions.step_9: Test again: Set the date within 10 min, verify NO ping
